archimate:Capability.name: Work Management
archimate:Capability.documentation: Ability to capture, organize, prioritize, route, interpret, disseminate, assign, and administer tasks, inbound requests, schedules, time, work events, and related decisions.

properties.value: Ability to capture, organize, prioritize, route, interpret, disseminate, assign, and administer tasks, inbound requests, schedules, time, work events, and related decisions.
